entry.title: Web3 Antivirus 0.11: DEX Token Pairs, Transaction Tax Fees, Language Switch
entry.content: As promised, we’re back with the freshest update to Web3 Antivirus! In this version, we focused on providing more clarity to transaction details, enhancing our detection mechanisms, and expanding W3A’s outreach to our Spanish-speaking web3 friends.The Web3 Antivirus team never stops working on new features and improvements. From now on, W3A will help you make informed investment decisions with our DEX token pairs suggestions and carefully calculated transaction tax fees. And for a guaranteed understanding of our cues, you can now effortlessly switch the language to Spanish!Full view of DEX token pairsWhenever you buy ERC-20 tokens, count on W3A as your trusted assistant. The extension will show you possible DEX pairs and their liquidity. This way, you will have a clear understanding of how this or that token pair is currently getting on and make well-grounded investment decisions that maximize your profit.Transaction tax fees identifiedTo provide you with even more clarity in transaction details, the extension shows the tax fee you have to pay when buying or selling tokens. If the commission exceeds 15%, W3A flags it as a high tax rate and marks it red to make sure you won’t overlook it.Meanwhile, anything surpassing 50% is marked as non-tradable and categorized as a potential honeypot scam.Detection enhancementsSpeaking of honeypot scams, we’ve fine-tuned our detection mechanism, so now W3A spots all kinds of it: no transfer, no sale, high transfer fee, high sale fee, and high purchase fee. Thus, as long as you keep the extension active, such scams are not a threat to you.Furthermore, we’ve introduced a fresh risk detector that alerts you when a contract you’re interacting with has custom white or blacklists. In such cases, the contract owner might potentially impose transaction restrictions on you in the future.We also tackled the issue of false responses, ensuring that no safe contracts are wrongly labeled as risky. Plus, we’ve sped up the analysis process for quicker resultsSpanish language supportWe’re committed to enhancing the user experience, so our developers and localization specialists teamed up to offer complete support for the Spanish language.Moving forward, we plan to broaden the language options, enabling more individuals to benefit from top-notch protection while browsing in web3.In the meantime, feel free to introduce W3A to your Spanish-speaking friends and join our referral program!Stay safe or ¡Manténganse seguros! We won’t keep you waiting long to share news about some more magníficas W3A features.

entry.title: Web3 Antivirus 0.10: New Scam Detections, Suspicious Activity Alerts, Dashboard Help
entry.content: Get acquainted with the newest pack of W3A updates, featuring enhanced scam detection mechanisms, detailed suspicious activity reports, Dashboard Help to answer any questions, and some more cool additions.We’ve been really busy with researching, designing, and coding in the past month to bring you a host of exciting new features and improve the existing functionality. So, let’s dive right into the new improvements.More scams on W3A radarFresh arrivals to the list of scams that W3A spots and promptly warns you about!Direct transfersThe extension instantly detects direct transfers of ETH and ERC-20 tokens. These are highly risky transactions since they are neither recorded on blockchain nor regulated by smart contracts. There are zero guarantees that you will get anything in return but almost a 99% chance of gifting all your tokens to scammers.eth_sign signaturesPhishing websites think they are smart, but we made sure W3A is way smarter. They can initiate as many malicious sign requests as possible, yet the extension will сatch eth_sign signatures and ruin all their thievish ambitions.Permit attacksNowadays, fraudsters started exploiting the vulnerabilities in the Permit and Permit2 signatures to make you grant approvals to all your ERC-20 tokens to them. But don’t worry — W3A gets you covered. Anytime you come across Permit attacks, we will show you a warning and indicate the risk level.Phishing contractsScammers often rely on our carelessness and shove us harmful transactions whose only function is to drain our wallets to the last token. Luckily, Web3 Antivirus never gets distracted, so such maneuvers are useless — you will get notified immediately.Phishing swapsWeb3 Antivirus keeps an eye on your swapping transactions and signals if scammers try to squeeze into your swapping transaction and receive tokens meant for you.HoneypotsWe’ve significantly elevated the precision of honeypot scam detection. Now, W3A will specify the exact type of honeypot you encounter: no transfer, high sale fee, or high purchase fee.Be attentive to our scam alerts and never let fraudsters play tricks with you.Contract suspicious activity unmaskedNo way for hiding suspicious activity — W3A sees all the sketchy moves not only of a contract you interact with but of all the contracts linked to it. The extension detects a contract’s involvement in terrorist financing, rug pulls, Ponzi schemes, theft, spam, and other illegal or harmful activities.So, that address better be reputable to transact with you. Otherwise, there is no deal.Easy Dashboard navigation with Help sectionExplore Dashboard functionality to the fullest with our Help section. We carefully documented and illustrated all its pages and sections to make your acquaintance with it as comfortable as possible.Now, you can easily check the meaning behind each section or metric at any time and navigate Dashboard with zero effort.Hop on the W3A Referral program!By the way, you can help us promote safe web3 too! By doing so, you will enter the best referrer competition and have a chance to vie for a prize pool of $150 in ETH. Moreover, each referral of yours will receive a free month of W3A Premium.For more details about the referral program, check our post.Keep safe and expect new cool features soon!
